com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context
Interface Scope

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationScope, DefaultScope, RequestScope, SessionScope
public interface Scope

A variable scope in a Context.

Method Summary
 String getName()
          Returns the name of this scope.
 Object getVariable(String name)
          Retrieves a variable by name.
 Set<String> getVariableNames()
          Returns all variable names in this scope.
 Object removeVariable(String name)
          Removes a variable.
 Object setVariable(String name, Object value)
          Sets a variable.
 

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
Returns the name of this scope.

Returns:
this scope's name

getVariableNames

Set<String> getVariableNames()
Returns all variable names in this scope.

Returns:
a set that contains the names of all variables in this scope (may be empty but not null)

getVariable

Object getVariable(String name)
                   throws ContextException
Retrieves a variable by name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the variable to retrieve
Returns:
the value of the variable with the given name
Throws:
ContextException - when there's no variable with the given name within this scope

setVariable

Object setVariable(String name,
                   Object value)
Sets a variable.

Parameters:
name - the name of the variable to set
value - the value to set
Returns:
the previous value of the variable (or null if the variable did not exist)

removeVariable

Object removeVariable(String name)
                      throws ContextException
Removes a variable.

Parameters:
name - the name of the variable to remove
Returns:
the previous value of the variable
Throws:
ContextException - when there's no variable with the given name within this scope
